'''Egg''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
=== Items ===
*{{ItemLink|Egg}} is an item laid by [[chicken]]s.
**{{ItemLink|Blue Egg}} and {{ItemLink|brown egg}}, variants of the egg that are laid by cold and warm chickens respectively.
*{{BlockLink|Dragon Egg}}, a block created when the [[ender dragon]] is killed.
*{{BlockLink|Turtle Egg}}, a block laid by [[turtle]]s.
*{{BlockLink|Frogspawn}}, a block of grouped frog eggs that is laid on water by [[frog]]s.
*{{BlockLink|Sniffer Egg}}, a block that can be found in [[suspicious sand]] in [[warm ocean ruins]], as well as being laid by [[sniffer]]s.
*{{ItemLink|Spawn egg}}, items used for spawning specific mobs.

=== Other ===
*[[Easter Eggs]], an intentional hidden message, inside joke, or feature in a work such as a computer program, web page, video game, television program, movie, book or any other form of media.
